short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A basic example extension with only required keys

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DarkMood is a browser extension that lets you easily enable dark mode on all websites to reduce eye strain, especially at night. Adjust the brightness and colors for a comfortable browsing experience at any time of the day. Use DarkMood to make your browser look stylish and user-friendly.

- Customizable dark theme: Apply dark mode to all websites or customize colors and brightness for each individual site.
- Instant toggle: Easily turn the extension on and off as needed.
- Optimized for nighttime: Reduce screen brightness and make browsing more comfortable for your eyes at night.
- Supports all websites: Whether you’re on a popular site or a niche page, DarkMood works on all websites in your browser.

Install DarkMood today and enjoy the comfort of dark mode with customizable settings for every website!
